Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: snooded beak
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: The beak of a turkey, complete with a snood.

values.description: A beak graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a turkey. A snood extends from the top of the beak down and it makes eating much more difficult.
A beak graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a turkey. A long snood is attached to it and it makes eating difficult. Somehow their speech isn't affected by it.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A fanned out plume of feathers sprouted from [PAWN_nameDef]'s butt.
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: fanned tailfeathers
